description: System-generated unique identifier for this contact comment record.
Identifier of the related contact (customer, vendor, or person) to which the comment pertains.
Date and time the comment record was created.
User or process that created the comment.
Flag indicating whether this comment should appear on printed documents; 1 = printable, 0 = internal only.
Options or bitmask controlling if/where this comment is copied to related documents (e.g., work orders, purchase orders); likely system-controlled; confirm with SME.
Free-text notes about the contact, such as vendor details, terms, or instructions.
User or process that last modified the comment record.
System timestamp of the most recent update to this record.
Timestamp of the last modification recorded at the user/application level; may differ from system last_modified.
Internal user ID of the creator; may be null or redundant with created_by_user; confirm with SME.
Timestamp captured by the user/application layer when created; may mirror create_date; confirm with SME.
Internal user ID of the last modifier; may mirror changed_by_user; confirm with SME.
Timestamp captured by the user/application layer for the last modification; may mirror last_modified; confirm with SME.
